faq.question: Do you offer student discounts?
faq.answer: Yes! Students with valid .edu email addresses receive special pricing on all paid plans. Sign up with your student email to automatically qualify for educational discounts.

faq.question: Can I summarize textbooks and course materials?
faq.answer: Absolutely! That's what most students use SummarizePDF for. Upload textbook chapters, lecture slides, course readings, and academic papers. Please ensure you have legal access to the materials you're summarizing.

faq.question: Will this help me write better papers?
faq.answer: Yes! Use SummarizePDF to quickly review multiple sources and identify key arguments and evidence. This helps you understand the literature faster and build stronger arguments in your own writing.

faq.question: Is there a free plan for students?
faq.answer: Yes! Our free plan includes 10 summaries per month - perfect for light use. For heavy coursework, our student-priced Pro plan offers unlimited summaries at a discount.

faq.question: Can I use this for group projects?
faq.answer: Definitely! The Team plan is perfect for study groups and group projects. Share document libraries, collaborate on summaries, and split the cost among team members.

faq.question: How fast can I get a summary?
faq.answer: Most documents are summarized in 10-30 seconds. Even lengthy textbook chapters (50+ pages) are processed in under a minute. Perfect when you're cramming before class or exams.
